short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add keyboard shortcuts to Claude UI similar to ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎯 Enhance your Claude AI experience with keyboard shortcuts! This open-source extension brings ChatGPT-style shortcuts to Claude, making your interactions faster and more intuitive.

✨ Current Features:
• ⌨️ ChatGPT-like shortcuts (Ctrl+Enter to send, Ctrl+/ for help)
• 🎨 Clean UI matching Claude's aesthetic
• 🔍 Easy-access shortcuts viewer
• 📱 Desktop & mobile support

🚀 Want to help make it even better? Join us on GitHub:
github.com/A-PachecoT/claude_ui_shortcuts

We're looking for contributors to help implement:
• 📋 Quick-copy functionality
• 💾 Customizable shortcuts
• And more!

Made with ❤️ by the Claude community, for the community. Free and open source!
